message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.EC, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper introduces a new mechanism for coordinating bidding in auctions, which falls under the category of game theory (cs.GT). The paper also models the setting as a Bayesian game, which is a subfield of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The mechanism is designed to improve efficiency and fairness in auctions, which falls under the category of computational economics (cs.EC). The paper also discusses the benefits of the mechanism in terms of optimization and welfare, which are topics in optimization (cs.DS) and machine learning (cs.LG).
